TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，从 "源" 切换到设计视图时，将分析描述 控件的标记源代码，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时，会将设计时控件持久保存到标记源代码，并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类的属性提供以下功能：The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 属性返回一个 对象，该对象通常包含一个对象，该对象是从设计器的继承树中的每个级别的 类派生的。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性返回用于在 "**自动套用格式**" 对话框中显示的格式设置方案的集合。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 属性为关联的 控件的字段和顶级 模板返回模板组的集合。The property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control and the top-level templates. - 属性始终返回 `true`，指示设计器创建关联的 的临时副本以生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 类的方法提供了以下功能：The methods of the class provide the following functionality: - 方法将关联的 控件绑定到设计时数据源。The method binds the associated control to a design-time data source. - 方法返回用于在设计时呈现关联 的标记。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的 。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 当单击关联 的设计时视图的区域时，将调用 方法。The method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated is clicked. - 当关联 的数据源的架构发生更改时，将调用 方法。The method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated changes. - 方法用于删除或添加属性，或者隐藏关联 的属性。The method is used to remove or add properties or to shadow properties of the associated . 控件中不支持设计时可编辑区域，因此 和 方法不具有任何功能。Design-time editable regions are not supported in the control, so the and methods have no functionality. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类，以便在设计时更改从 控件派生的控件的外观。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从 派生 `MyGridView` 控件。The example derives the `MyGridView` control from the . `MyGridView` 只是 的副本。The `MyGridView` is simply a copy of the . 该示例还派生了 类中的 `MyGridViewDesigner` 类，并为 `MyGridView` 控件上的 `MyGridViewDesigner` 放置了一个 对象。The example also derives the `MyGridViewDesigner` class from the class and places a object for the `MyGridViewDesigner` on the `MyGridView` control. `MyGridViewDesigner` 重写 方法，以便在设计时在 "**属性**" 网格中显示 属性。The `MyGridViewDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 它重写 方法，以便在设计时将 属性（如果指定）作为新的 `MyGridView` 控件中的第一行。It overrides the method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyGridView` control at design time. 如果 `MyGridView` 控件的 属性具有 或 值，则 会在控件周围绘制一个蓝色虚线边框，使其范围更清晰。If the property of the `MyGridView` control has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在设计图面上创建关联的 控件或该控件的副本时，.NET Framework 内部构造 类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

The associated with this designer.

summary.span: 获取或设置预定义的格式设置方案的集合，以便在“自动套用格式”对话框中显示。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of predefined formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含 的预定义方案。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是从内部类的 XML 编码成员填充的。The object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要绑定到设计时数据源的 控件。

span.span: The to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联的 控件绑定到设计时数据源，并为 控件的设计时呈现的每个单元格的 字段指定唯一的值。The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source and assigns a unique value to the field of each cell of the control's design-time rendering. `dataBoundControl` 参数是与此设计器相关联的 控件或该控件的副本。The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联的 控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行以下操作：The method does the following: 1. 如果 属性为空，则将该控件的 属性设置为 `true`。Sets the property of the control to `true`, if the property is empty. 2. 如果无法获取数据源的架构，则将控件的 属性设置为 `null`。Sets the property of the control to `null`, if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained. 3. 刷新 对象以强制调用 方法。Refreshes the object to force the method to be called. 4. 调用基方法以生成标记。Calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在从 类继承的类中重写 方法，以便在设计时更改 控件的外观。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 如果定义了 ，则此示例将在网格中添加一个新的第一行以包含 属性。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果派生自 类的控件的 属性具有 或 值，则 会在控件周围绘制一个蓝色虚线边框，使其范围更清晰。If the property of the control that is derived from the class has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不会更改控件的运行时外观。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果重写 方法，请务必调用基方法，因为它最终通过多个重写级别调用了 控件或该控件的副本来生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: 一个 ，将在其中添加控件设计时视图中定义的可选择和可单击区域。

span.span: A to which definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control are added.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记，并填充设计器区域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 方法来生成用于 控件的设计时呈现的标记。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 还用 对象填充 `regions` 设计时呈现的每个可单击或可选择的区域。The also populates `regions` with a object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering. 对于 ，每行中的第一个单元格是可选择的;行中的所有单元格都是可单击的。For the , the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在从 类继承的类中重写 方法，以便在设计时更改 控件的外观。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 如果定义了 ，则此示例将在网格中添加一个新的第一行以包含 属性。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果派生自 类的控件的 属性具有 或 值，则 会在控件周围绘制一个蓝色虚线边框，使其范围更清晰。If the property of the control that is derived from the class has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不会更改控件的运行时外观。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果重写 方法，请务必调用基方法或 重载，因为它们最终会通过多个重写级别，对 控件或控件的副本调用来生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method or the overload, because they eventually, through several override levels, call on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器宿主在准备好使用设计器呈现 控件时调用 方法。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 及其基方法会配置属性并设置设计器操作所需的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component` 参数是与此设计器相关联的 控件，或是 控件的副本。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClick(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnClick (e As DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，它定义控件的被单击区域。

span.span: A that defines the clicked region of the control.

summary.span: 当单击关联控件设计时视图的区域时，会调用它。

span.span: Called when a region of the design-time view of the associated control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存选定的区域索引，并更新在设计图面上呈现 控件的标记。The method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源架构更改时，将调用它。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非设计器处于模板编辑模式或正在添加或编辑字段，否则 方法将调用 方法，该方法反过来会调用 方法来更新 控件，以反映数据源更改。Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从 方法派生的方法使用设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性，以及在 "**属性**" 网格中添加或删除属性。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 对于 控件， 方法会将 属性的 对象设置为在控件处于模板模式时 `false`。For the control, the method sets the object of the property to `false` when the control is in template mode. 这是因为不能使用 "**字段**" 对话框删除处于模板模式下的列。This is so a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the **Fields** dialog box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在从 继承的类中重写 方法，以便在设计时更改 控件的**属性**网格。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the to change the **Properties** grid of the control at design time. 该示例使 属性在**属性**网格中可见。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 重写 方法，以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到属性或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示的关联控件的示例行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
The number of sample rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关联的 控件允许分页且 属性大于0，则 属性返回 加1（但不大于100）。If the associated control allows paging and the property is greater than 0, the property returns the plus 1 (but not greater than 100). 如果 不允许分页或 为0， 将 `5`返回。If the does not allow paging or the is 0, returns `5`.

A to write to .

summary.span: 指定关联控件设计时视图中可编辑区域的内容。

span.span: Specifies content for an editable region of the design-time view for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法没有功能;在 控件的设计时视图中，不支持可编辑区域。The method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取或设置用于关联控件字段的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中为 中的每个模板化字段包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性构造 对象的集合，每个对象对应一个模板化数据字段，另一个用于关联 控件中的每个控件模板（页导航和空数据）。The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control template (pager and empty data) in the associated control. 对于每个预定义的行模板类型，数据字段 元素都有一个 对象。The data field elements have a object for each of the predefined row template types. 控件模板 元素包含一个 。The control template elements contain a single .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.

value.span: 如果设计器应使用临时副本（而非与设计器关联的实际控件）来生成设计时标记，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终 `true` 属性，设计器将使用包含关联 控件的副本的 控件来生成设计时标记。The property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控件不会影响 的任何持久性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果已重写 属性以返回 `false`，则设计器将使用关联的 本身来生成设计时标记，对控件的设计时更改将保留在页标记源中。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以重写 属性，以返回 或根据控件是否用类级别的 对象进行标记来确定其值。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level object.

para.span: 如果未重写 ，则 将忽略 。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
